content: Create KPIs for key drivers of profit
Model each revenue stream to clearly identify contribution margin

Develop working Income Statement, Balance Sheet and Cash Flow statements focused on forecast goals.  These models may be drawn from your existing books.  Forecast statements are derived from easy to understand rules of thumb.
Mentor Management Teams to result in alignment with company vision and foster productivity and growth of innovation.
Create Business Plans leading to better company performance and attract credit and investment resources.
Review the Business model with the goal of identifying areas of improvement and processes to achieve such goals.
